summary: This document is a telephone call detail record from AT&T, produced in response to a legal request (Matter ID 2790840). It logs hundreds of calls from July 6, 2019, to August 11, 2019, showing originating and terminating numbers, call durations, and codes. The record was run on August 15, 2019, and covers the period immediately before and after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest and death.

events.title: Start of Call Log Period
events.description: The telephone call detail record begins logging calls from this date.

events.title: Intense Call Activity
events.description: The log shows a high volume of calls on this date, which was the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his jail cell.

events.title: End of Call Log Period
events.description: The telephone call detail record ends logging calls on this date, the day after Epstein's death.

keyFacts: This is a call detail record from AT&T covering the period from July 6, 2019, to August 11, 2019, which includes the date of Jeffrey Epstein's arrest (July 6, 2019) and his death (August 10, 2019).
The record was produced for a legal matter (ID 2790840) and run on August 15, 2019, shortly after Epstein's death.

The log contains detailed call data including timestamps (in UTC), originating/terminating numbers, and call durations, but all specific phone numbers and identifiers are redacted or represented by codes.
There is a notable cluster of call activity on August 10, 2019, the date Epstein died.
The document is marked as proprietary and for authorized persons only, indicating it was part of an official investigation.
